short_summary: This is a property tender to replace the fire alarm system in the RCMP detachments.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the replacement of the existing fire alarm system to new addressable type in RCMP detachment located at 5 Sawtooth Road, Telegraph Creek, BC.
duration_in_months: When the contract will be closed - 2023-08-21 14:00:00, and will it run approximately - 2023-09-11 until 2024-03-10.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify: Fire Alarm System Replacement for RCMP Detachment in British Columbia

** Tender Information **

* **Tender Number**: WS4143423332
* **Publication Date**: August 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 21, 2023 (14:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 11, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 10, 2024

** Procurement Details **

* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: British Columbia and Canada

** Requirement **

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the replacement of the existing fire alarm system to an new addressable type at the RCMP detachment located at 5 Sawtooth Road, Telegraph Creek, BC. The selected contractor will be responsible for the design, installation, testing, and commissioning of the new system.

** Evaluation Criteria **

Bidders will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

** Solicitation Documents **

A comprehensive list of documents, including this notice and any amendments, can be found on the [Ariba website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17146523?extsite=MTcxNDY1MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

** Point of Contact **

For any inquiries or clarification, please contact:

* Donna Fung, Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Email: [donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:donna.fung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

** Note **

Please note that the tender has expired on August 21, 2023. The solicitation number is WS4143423332, and the reference number is WS4143423332-Doc4143567300. This tender was an Invitation to Qualify, and the procurement method was Competitive - Open Bidding. The evaluation criteria was the lowest price. All information can be found on the Ariba website [Ariba website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17146523?extsite=MTcxNDY1MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). All point of contacts are obstructed.
